First of all, it's not like anybody here has a gf, so they can't be a cuck(who knows, they could be imagining themselves as the old man), second, the fuckers who comment on this saying that this is "bad ntr" cause no rape are just wrong. This is perfectly acceptable simply due to the quality of the art alome, and on top of that, the "story" told isn't completely ridiculous based on the characters like most ntr is.

Even without rape and the other things the other comments mentioned, I think this doujin does a great job with the whole manipulation aspect. I liked how page by page the slut wife let us do more things to her from intimate kissing to treating her like an onahole just for cumming early. Her tough attitude in the beginning being broken is great as well. Also the pills is a nice touch since it leaves room for a potential second chapter where  she gets tricked into crossing that boundary(impregnate?). Its not typical of ntr to do this but its nice that they gave reason to steal from the cuck (not that you really need any when the wife is a thicc anime milf lol)

By protag I mean the husband.. which really, isn't a protag at all since he's only visible in 3 pages.

The protag is the absolute opposite of a degenerate, so identifying with him is straight up impossible. Even though it's probably the lamest netorare I have ever read (not even a slight sensation of rage), it's still an amazingly high-quality manga. 10/10!
